Article Marketing Important Tips For Success

06 Oct 2008

You can start your own home based business even if you're broke, when you use article marketing. Here are my top 10 tips for success.

1. Set Goals for Your Article Marketing\nGoals are vital. Make your goals achievable, measurable and specific. Transform your goal by chunking them down into action steps to complete daily.

2. Write at Least Two Articles Every Day\nYour articles will work faithfully for you as online sales people forever, and the more you have selling for you, the more your business will grow. Write at least two articles every day.

3. Remember to Use the Keywords Searchers Use - the Search Engines Are Your Friends\nUse the keywords which searchers use, for more detail www.newbies-copywriting.com There are many free online keyword research tools; use them, and then use the keywords in your articles. However, don't overdo it. Forget "keyword density", its nonsense, and leads to unnatural writing, which the search engines penalize.

4. Your Articles are advertising - your Resource Box is Vital\nYou give free information in your articles. Your resource box is your chance to share your advertising message. Treat it as an online ad, and use split testing to see which boxes get the most clicks through.

5. Original Content Is King Online - Write from Your Own Experiences\nOriginal content is king. Don't rehash others' articles. Write from your own experiences for real success.

6. Be Patient - Expect a Three Month Lag Until You Achieve the Best Results\nIt takes time for the rummage around engines to index your articles and start sending you traffic. Expect it to take around three months.

7. Get Enthusiastic - Read Motivational Literature and Listen to Tapes\nYour enthusiasm sells, and it comes from beginning to end in your articles' tone. Read and listen to motivational materials to hang about enthusiastic and motivated.

8. Keep Your Plans to Yourself - Avoid Others' Sabotage\nFew people understand the online world, and even fewer understand article marketing. Carry on your plans to yourself, for more detail www.lazyman-article-guide.com your friends don't mean to sabotage you, but their doubts will infect you. Stay positive... be quiet on the subject of what you're doing. Just do it.

9. Track Your Articles - Write Reports\nEach month, write a report for yourself about how your articles are progressing. Check their rankings in the search engines. Which articles got the most views?\nJust write a one-page report. Your reports will track your progress, and will motivate you, as you see your earnings increase month by month.

10. Ideas Are Everywhere - Keep an Idea Notebook\nKeep an idea notebook. Ideas are everywhere, but they're ephemeral. Write them down so you'll never run out of article ideas.\n
